articles.author: Hannah Mcdonald
articles.title: Rare disease spread by cats spotted in Britain for first time ever - Daily Mail
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE: Until now, the rare cat-transmitted infection had never been seen outside of South America. Three Brits were struck down with the fungus.
articles.content:
A painful skin-blistering illness spread by cats has been detected in Britain for the first time ever, MailOnline can reveal. 
Until now, the rare cat-transmitted infection had never been seen outsi… [+4913 chars]
